items.sentence: Tom did have a drinking problem for a while, but now he doesn't drink at all.
If you want to master a foreign language, you must study as much as possible.
Seeing a rat run across the floor made me never ever want to eat there again.
Dolphins, not elephants, may have the best memories of any non-human species.
Mary was arrested after the bachelorette party for driving while intoxicated.
